divs: sighting details17 july 2010 93-94 im not sure which im pretty sure 93, december before christmas me my girlfreind and her mom went to get xmas tree, on the way back about a mile back on her property on a dirt rd. we were on "the top of the world" so called, the highest elevation behind day ave. 7900-8000 block away from the main highway, geographic information should get you to that big hill, there was a oil pump on the hill. it was dusk, i saw out the corner of my eye a streak of light from one side of the sky to the next and stop at a dead stop. and then to another side of the sky and stop, i told her to stop and we all got out, more than one object repeated this in no random order, and no particular pattern, i would say approximately 40-50 of these fairly bright lights that resembles something the size of a lg. remote control aircraft, i'd say a 1000-2000 ft or maybe more in the sky. we sat and watched this light show for it seemed like an hour, it was almost dark and they thinned out, we were excited about it, knowing it had to be something unmanned, or not from this world, we headed back to the house 7976 day ave. navarre oh, the site of a 1800 log cabin and old barn, over to the right of the mobile that used to be there me facing the mobile, i heard a low pulsating hum, very powerful like a whum whum whum whum, kinda sounded like someone with 20 15" subs really loud in the distance, i saw outta the corner of my eye while bringing the tree in the mobile a incandecsent light, i looked up and over the trees couple hundred ft. up or so a very large object hummed along very slowly.looking at it i noticed a colorful fog in a reccess in the underside, the colors remind me of oil in water, but looked like a gas, in combustion of some type, swirling in this contained reccess, i didnt notice any standard aviation markings as i know is mandetory like blinking lights or any thing of that sort, i watched it for a second and ran inside, called hopkins airport and asked if there long range radar could pick up something that far away, they said its probably a blimp, the only two operational blimps in cleveland are fuji, and goodyear blimps. they gave me the numbers to the hanger, i called i believe if my memory serves me right and agian the date and time are approximate, goodyear said there blimp was in the hangar, fuji said they where over cleveland, i might have these reversed but none the less cleveland is 50+ miles away, and they where doing arial veiws of a football game over the old stadium. they said to take a picture, but when i went out it was gone. we never said a word agian about it until i was reminded of the experience, i didnt want people to think i was nuts and there wasnt anything on the news so i wrote it off. 16-17 years later, im deciding to report this. i gave the whole experience thought, i believe the little objects were scouting the area to make sure it was safe for the mother ship\ secondly potentially jamming any radar from picking it up, i dont know why our land??? my x's 70 year old mom still lives on the premise and remembers everything,which i just found out, my 14 yr old son i never saw because of break up lives there now, i just reunited with him on the phone yesterday. my x also remembers that night. *(wit's name and other info deleted--sgonzalez\cms.
